meanings.definition: To send (a letter, package, etc.) by mail.
meanings.sent1: I mailed a birthday card to my grandma.
meanings.sent2: She always mails her bills on time.
meanings.sent3: The cat mailed a love letter to the dog next door.
meanings.sent4: His words were like mailed invitations to a grand celebration.
meanings.sent5: The idea of mailing a surprise made her smile.

meanings.definition: To deposit in a post office or mailbox for transmission.
meanings.sent1: He mailed the package to his friend in another state.
meanings.sent2: They mailed their wedding invitations last week.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel mailed an acorn to its friend for safekeeping.
meanings.sent4: The news was like a mailed package of joy to her ears.
meanings.sent5: The thought of mailing a secret made her heart race.
